name: Classic Cheeseburger
description: A juicy beef patty topped with melted cheddar cheese, served on a toasted bun with lettuce, tomato, and pickles.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Thin crust pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves, drizzled with olive oil.

name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Grilled chicken breast on a bed of crisp romaine lettuce, tossed with creamy Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Penne Pasta Alfredo
description: Penne pasta tossed in a creamy Alfredo sauce, garnished with Parmesan cheese and fresh parsley.

name: BBQ Ribs
description: Tender and succulent pork ribs slathered in a tangy BBQ sauce, served with coleslaw and fries.

name: Vegetarian Pad Thai
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with tofu, bean sprouts, carrots, bell peppers, and peanuts, in a flavorful Pad Thai sauce.

name: Fish and Chips
description: Crispy beer-battered fish fillets served with golden fries, tartar sauce, and a side of coleslaw.

name: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Chicken Breast
description: Grilled chicken breast stuffed with sautéed spinach and creamy feta cheese, served with roasted potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Soft corn tortillas filled with seasoned ground beef, topped with shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, cheese, and salsa.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Warm, gooey chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: Breaded chicken cutlets topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese, served with spaghetti.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed in creamy Caesar dressing, topped with croutons and shaved Parmesan cheese.

name: Beef Stir Fry
description: Tender beef strips sautéed with a colorful medley of vegetables, served over steamed rice.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh mozzarella cheese, ripe tomatoes, and basil leaves drizzled with balsamic glaze and olive oil.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: Succulent shrimp sautéed in a garlic and butter sauce, served over linguine pasta.

name: Vegetable Curry
